text: The Castle of Purity () is a 1972 Mexican drama film directed by Arturo Ripstein. ==Plot== The film depicts a man who keeps his family isolated in his home for years to protect them from "the evil nature of human beings" while inventing, with his wife, rat poison. ==Cast== * Claudio Brook – Gabriel Lima * Rita Macedo – Beatriz * Arturo Beristáin – Porvenir * Diana Bracho – Utopía * Gladys Bermejo – Voluntad * Mario Castillón Bracho – Undercover cop ==Awards== ===Ariel Awards=== The Ariel Awards are awarded annually by the Mexican Academy of Film Arts and Sciences in Mexico.
